fields_of_interest: Education and training, Youth, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
eu_initiatives: YEAR is specially following the EU initiatives and policies related to Research and Innovation, including funding and research strategies. Moreover, Open Science and barriers that young researchers face in their careers are also key for the network.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
YEAR is the network of young researchers in Europe. 
Non-profit organization that gathers young professionals from different RTOs and IRBs across Europe. 
Our mission: create opportunities to support the development of your career by helping you to extend your professional network and gain new skills in an international environment. This mission is carried out based on 4 pillars: networking, mobility, training and consultancy, for the latter we act as interface with the EC giving voice to young researchers. 
Our goal: To be a part in the Europe of the future as a platform for researchers to grow professionally.
relevant_communication:
Year focuses on creating opportunities to support the development of young researchers' careers by helping them to extend their professional network and gain skills in a international environment.  
Moreover, Year network is part of the Open Science Policy Platform and took part in writing the Bratislava declaration of young researchers. We have attended to events related to those issues and organized our own events related to open science and open innovation and surveys to gather the views of young researchers regarding open science's implementation and young researchers' concerns about their careers.
